title: Identify Past Continuous Actions
objectives: Understand Past Continuous at Beginner level
Apply Past Continuous in real conversations

vocabulary.example: I was reading when you called.
He was sleeping during the storm.

content.introduction: Past Continuous describes actions ongoing at a specific moment in the past. It uses was/were + verb-ing.
content.explanation: Use 'was' with I, he, she, it; 'were' with you, we, they. It shows background actions or interrupted events. Remember to add -ing to the verb.
examples: I was reading when you arrived.
tips: Use with 'when' or 'while' for two actions happening simultaneously.
Focus on the background action in storytelling.

exercises.question: We ____ (study) when the power went out.
Describe what you were doing yesterday at 3 PM.

culturalNote: Past Continuous is often used in American storytelling to set scenes or describe ongoing past actions.
